name: As Good As Fleming
desc: When a character uses a Follow-up ATK on an enemy target, increases DMG received by the target by 8% for a max of 3 time(s), lasting for 1 turn(s).
enhanced_desc: When a character uses a Follow-up ATK on an enemy target, increases DMG received by the target by 12% for a max of 3 time(s), lasting for 1 turn(s).
